wikitext.*:
'''BEN''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "corner (from inside), angle from inside".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 352 (root appearing as "BEN-")</ref><ref>{{VT|45a}}, p. 7</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Noldorin]]: ''bennas'' ("angle")<ref name=LR/>
